name: Puzzle Hero Captain Penguin
description:
All beautiful images and cool characters. This game contains 5 levels.
- Easy Level
- Normal Level
- Hard Level
- Advance Level
- Kids Level (No Ads)

How to play :
Use your touch screen to move the random puzzle pieces around the picture board. Click on a puzzle piece to rotate it. If you can complete the picture puzzle in a record time, your score will increase! Each picture has different levels of hardness Play as your favorite much more!

Try to complete all levels, you'll love this Puzzle Game!
